hero: Fresh seeds, nuts and kurt from the manufacturer
artclTitle_1: Benefits of sunflower seeds: vitamins and microelements
artclDesc_1: Sunflower seeds are not only a tasty snack but also a source of beneficial nutrients: vitamins E, B, and minerals that strengthen the heart and skin.
artclTitle_2: Nuts - benefits for the brain and energy
artclDesc_2: Almonds, cashews, and walnuts are rich in omega-3, magnesium, and antioxidants that support memory and concentration.
seedsTitle: Seeds ‚Äì a source of energy, vitamins, and mood
seedsText_1: Sunflower seeds are not just a tasty snack, but a true natural source of vitamins and microelements. They are rich in vitamin E, which protects cells from aging, strengthens skin and hair, and supports heart health.
seedsText_2: Seeds contain B vitamins ‚Äì B1, B2, B6 ‚Äì which help maintain the nervous system and improve metabolism. In addition, they contain magnesium, zinc, iron, selenium, and calcium ‚Äì everything the body needs for strong health and energy.
seedsText_4: Sunflower seeds are rich in plant fats and protein, making them an excellent source of energy. These fats are easily absorbed without overloading the digestive system. They also contain antioxidants that protect the body from the harmful effects of free radicals.
seedsText_6: Strengthen the immune system and increase resilience to stress.
seedsText_7: Improve the condition of skin, hair, and nails.
seedsText_9: Reduce levels of ‚Äúbad‚Äù cholesterol in the blood.
seedsText_10: Help with recovery after physical exertion.
seedsText_12: Seeds are an extremely rich source of vitamin E (tocopherol), one of the most powerful natural antioxidants. It protects cells from aging and helps the skin stay firm and healthy. They also contain:
seedsText_14: Zinc ‚Äì speeds up tissue healing and supports immunity.
seedsText_16: Iron ‚Äì prevents anemia and boosts energy levels.
seedsText_18: Seeds are a product that should be eaten in moderation. Just a small handful (about 30 grams) per day is enough to get the daily dose of vitamin E. It‚Äôs better to choose raw or lightly roasted seeds without salt to preserve maximum benefits. They can be added to salads, porridge, smoothies, or used as a healthy snack.
seedsText_20: Sunflower seeds are actively used by athletes and people with high stress levels. They help with recovery after exertion and promote the production of serotonin ‚Äì the ‚Äúhappiness hormone.‚Äù
nutsTitle: Nuts ‚Äì superfood for the brain and energy
nutsText_1: Nuts are a source of healthy fats, proteins, and antioxidants. They contain omega-3 fatty acids, which support brain function, reduce stress levels, and promote a good mood.
nutsText_2: Almonds are rich in magnesium and potassium, cashews in zinc and iron, and walnuts contain the rare coenzyme Q10, which supports the heart.
nutsText_3: Nuts are a true treasure trove of beneficial nutrients that nature created specifically to support our health and energy. Despite their small size, they contain a large amount of proteins, vitamins, minerals, and healthy fats needed by the body every day.
nutsText_5: The term ‚Äúsuperfood‚Äù is applied to products with a high concentration of nutrients. Nuts fully justify this status. They are rich in omega-3 fatty acids, antioxidants, B vitamins, vitamin E, and microelements ‚Äì magnesium, zinc, iron, and potassium.
nutsText_6: Regular consumption of nuts helps to:
nutsText_11: Slow down aging processes thanks to antioxidants.
nutsText_13: The brain needs fatty acids to maintain normal nerve cell function. Walnuts are especially useful in this regard as they are rich in alpha-linolenic acid ‚Äì a plant-based omega-3 analogue. These substances stimulate neural connections and enhance learning ability. Nuts also contain vitamin E, which protects brain cells from oxidative stress. Studies show that regular consumption of almonds and hazelnuts can reduce the risk of cognitive decline and dementia in old age.
nutsText_15: Nuts are one of the best natural sources of polyunsaturated fats, necessary for proper heart function. Omega-3 acids help reduce cholesterol levels, and magnesium regulates blood pressure and strengthens blood vessels. Almonds, for example, contain high amounts of potassium and magnesium, which improve blood circulation. Pistachios help lower triglycerides and have mild anti-inflammatory effects.
nutsText_17: Thanks to their high protein and healthy fat content, nuts provide long-lasting satiety and a stable source of energy without blood sugar spikes. This is why athletes and active people often include nuts in their diet. Cashews and peanuts are rich in iron and zinc, which are especially important for energy production and immune support.
nutsText_19: Almonds ‚Äì a source of vitamin E, magnesium, and calcium.
nutsText_20: Walnuts ‚Äì contain coenzyme Q10, a rare antioxidant that supports heart function.
nutsText_21: Hazelnuts ‚Äì rich in folic acid and vitamin B6.
nutsText_22: Pistachios ‚Äì a source of fiber and protein.
nutsText_23: Cashews ‚Äì contain iron and zinc, supporting immunity.
nutsText_25: It is important to remember that nuts are high-calorie foods. Just 30‚Äì40 grams per day is enough to get all the beneficial nutrients without harming your figure. It‚Äôs best to eat them raw or lightly roasted, without salt or sugar. Nuts can be added to porridge, salads, yogurts, smoothies, or simply taken as a healthy snack.
aboutDesc2: are produced in the heart of Kazakhstan, under the generous sun and with respect for traditions. We believe that taste is born from care: each seed is carefully selected, roasted according to a time-tested recipe, and lovingly packaged.
aboutDesc3: Our goal is to preserve the true taste of childhood, that familiar aroma of fresh, crunchy seeds. We are proud to create everything here, in our native land, with warmth and attention to every detail.
aboutDesc4: is quality that families trust. After all, the best is for children!

polText_3:
This personal data processing policy is prepared in accordance with the requirements of the Law of the Republic of Kazakhstan No. 94-V dated 01.05.2013 ‚ÄúOn Personal Data‚Äù (hereinafter ‚Äî the Law on Personal Data) and defines the procedure for processing personal data and the measures to ensure the security of personal data taken by DAAR LLC (hereinafter ‚Äî the Operator).

1.1. The Operator considers it a top priority to ensure the rights and freedoms of individuals when processing their personal data, including the protection of privacy, personal and family secrets.

1.2. This personal data processing policy (hereinafter ‚Äî the Policy) applies to all information that the Operator may receive about visitors to the website https://daar.kz
polText_4: 2. Key terms used in the Policy
polText_5:
2.1. Automated processing of personal data ‚Äî processing personal data using computing tools.

2.2. Blocking of personal data ‚Äî temporary suspension of personal data processing (except when processing is necessary to clarify personal data).

2.3. Website ‚Äî a set of graphical and informational materials, as well as software and databases, ensuring access via the network address https://daar.kz

2.4. Personal data information system ‚Äî a set of personal data contained in databases and the information technologies and technical means ensuring their processing.

2.5. Anonymization of personal data ‚Äî actions resulting in the impossibility of determining the ownership of personal data to a specific user without additional information.

2.6. Personal data processing ‚Äî any action or set of actions with personal data, including collection, recording, systematization, accumulation, storage, updating, retrieval, use, transfer, anonymization, blocking, deletion, destruction.

2.7. Operator ‚Äî a legal entity or individual that organizes and/or performs the processing of personal data, and determines the purposes and scope of such processing.

2.8. Personal data ‚Äî any information relating directly or indirectly to an identified or identifiable User of the website https://daar.kz

2.9. Personal data authorized for dissemination ‚Äî personal data made publicly available by the subject's consent.

2.10. User ‚Äî any visitor of the website https://daar.kz

2.11. Provision of personal data ‚Äî actions aimed at disclosing personal data to a specific person or group.

2.12. Dissemination of personal data ‚Äî any actions aimed at disclosing personal data to an indefinite number of persons or making them publicly available.

2.13. Cross-border transfer of personal data ‚Äî transferring personal data to a foreign state authority, individual, or legal entity.

2.14. Destruction of personal data ‚Äî actions that irreversibly destroy personal data with no possibility of recovery.
polText_6: 3. Key rights and obligations of the Operator
polText_7:
3.1. The Operator has the right to:

‚Äî receive accurate information and/or documents containing personal data from the data subject;

‚Äî continue processing personal data without consent in cases provided by the Law on Personal Data;

‚Äî independently determine measures necessary to comply with legal requirements regarding personal data processing.

3.2. The Operator is obliged to:

‚Äî provide information about personal data processing upon request;

‚Äî organize personal data processing in accordance with legislation;

‚Äî respond to inquiries of data subjects;

‚Äî notify the authorized body upon request;

‚Äî publish this Policy on the website;

‚Äî take legal, organizational, and technical measures to protect personal data;

‚Äî stop processing or transfer of personal data in cases provided by law;

‚Äî fulfill other obligations provided by the Law on Personal Data.
polText_8: 4. Rights and obligations of data subjects
polText_9:
4.1. Data subjects have the right to:

‚Äî receive information regarding personal data processing;

‚Äî request correction, blocking, or destruction of inaccurate or unnecessary data;

‚Äî give prior consent for marketing purposes;

‚Äî withdraw consent for personal data processing;

‚Äî appeal unlawful actions of the Operator;

‚Äî exercise other rights under legislation.

4.2. Data subjects must:

‚Äî provide accurate personal data;

‚Äî notify the Operator about changes.

4.3. Persons providing false information bear responsibility under the law.
polText_11:
5.1. Processing shall be lawful and fair.

5.2. Processing is limited to specific, legitimate purposes.

5.3. Databases with incompatible purposes shall not be merged.

5.4. Only necessary data shall be processed.

5.5. Content and volume must correspond to processing purposes.

5.6. Accuracy and relevance shall be ensured.

5.7. Personal data shall be stored only as long as needed.
polText_14: Conclusion, execution, and termination of civil law contracts
polText_20: Collection, recording, systematization, storage, destruction, anonymization. Sending informational emails.
polText_22:
7.1. Processing is based on consent.

7.2. Necessary for legal or international obligations.

7.3. Necessary for justice or legal acts.

7.4. Necessary for execution of contracts.

7.5. Necessary for legitimate interests.

7.6. Processing of publicly available data.

7.7. Processing of data required by law to be published.
polText_23: 8. Procedure for collection, storage, transfer and other processing
polText_24:
8.1. Security measures are applied.

8.2. Data is not shared with third parties without consent or legal requirement.

8.3. Users may update their data via email.

8.4. Data is stored only as long as necessary.

8.5. Third-party service providers are responsible for their own data policies.

8.6. Restrictions by data subjects do not apply for public interests.

8.7. Confidentiality is ensured.

8.8. Storage is only as long as necessary.

8.9. Processing ends when goals are achieved or consent is withdrawn.
polText_25: 9. List of actions performed by the Operator with personal data
polText_26:
9.1. Collection, recording, systematization, storage, updating, retrieval, use, transfer, anonymization, blocking, deletion, destruction.

9.2. Automated processing with transmission over networks.
polText_28:
10.1. The Operator must notify the authorized body before cross-border transfers (except within the EAEU).

10.2. Transfers are allowed only if reliable protection is ensured in the foreign state.
polText_30:
11.1. Any information obtained is confidential, except as required by law.

11.2. All necessary measures are taken to protect personal data.
polText_32:
12.1. This Policy is effective from its publication date.

12.2. The Operator may amend the Policy without user consent. New version is effective upon publication.

12.3. Questions should be sent via email: daar.kazakhstan@gmail.com
